title: Investigate Cazador's Palace
content:
ight. Ulma persists, urging you to rescue them or seek vengeance. Respond with:

If Astarion won't assist, I will. Astarion owes them revenge at the very least. There's nothing more to discuss if we can't help.

Choose the second option, leading Astarion to agree. This update progresses the quest "A Pale Elf." and "Investigate Casador's Palace".

Upon arriving at Wyrm's Crossing, X:-13 Y:58, proceed to Fraygo's Flophouse, X:-16 Y:76, where a cutscene unfolds featuring Dalyria and Pale Petras eng
